name: Revenge of the Martian Vampires
description: Revenge of the Martian Vampires is a script that explores themes of extraterrestrial invasion, vampiric revenge, and cosmic horror. Characters have abilities related to space, blood, and otherworldly vengeance.
author: Jams, Josh, Kerry, & Zak
specialRules: Focus on extraterrestrial and vampiric themes
Characters with space, blood, and revenge mechanics
Explores concepts of cosmic horror and otherworldly vengeance
setupNotes: This script emphasizes extraterrestrial invasion and vampiric revenge. Players should be prepared for abilities involving space, blood, and cosmic horror elements.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: High-lethality/stacked threats. Keep kill ordering crystal clear and announce death counts cleanly at dawn.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Protect information hubs and force Demon tells through constrained choices. Evil: Sync minion/demon kills for maximum confusion.
bluffing: Alternate between safe utility bluffs and dramatic power claims to control pace.
